com.bwfcwalshy.easiermc.utils

Class ItemStackBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bwfcwalshy.easiermc.utils.ItemStackBuilder

  • public class ItemStackBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    The ItemStackBuilder allows ItemStacks to be very easily created. ItemStackBuilder also comes with an automatic lore-shorter, so if your lore is greater than MAX_LORE_LENGTH then it will be moved to a new line. The lore will also keep whatever ChatColor it was using as well! And it will not split it mid-word, it will always check for the closest space and split there.
    ItemStackBuilder also comes with an auto-updater, this means you can make your items or blocks automatically update the lore. To do this the builder will save the current version in the lore hidden with ChatColors and EasierMC will check that when a player first moves or when a player interacts. If the item is not up to date it will make sure it is!
    To enable to auto-updater just do autoUpdate() and if you want to disable it or enable it at other times you can do setAutoUpdate(boolean)
